ableton-mcp.name: AbletonMCP
ableton-mcp.description: AbletonMCP connects Ableton Live to Claude AI through the Model Context Protocol (MCP), allowing Claude to directly interact with and control Ableton Live. This integration enables prompt-assisted music production, track creation, and Live session manipulation.

blender.name: Blender
blender.description: Blender integration allowing prompt enabled 3D scene creation, modeling and manipulation.
